search_placeholder: Search by cost code and description
import_description: Your input file (.txt or .xls) must be in specific format in orderto be imported

tooltip.code:
The cost code rule defined by Drever: mmmnnn (6 figures),with conventions:

  • mmm can only be all A-Z or 0-9
  • nnn can only be call 0-9

title.report: Report the import cost codes result
